chapter.title: Installation
chapter.para:
Installation is fairly simple.
Take the Org-Folder and place it somewhere your include-path reaches it. Make the folder Org/Heigl/Hyphenator/shared writeable. As an alternative you can also copy that folder to any location you like and set the HYPHERNATOR_HOME-Environment Variable or PHP-constant to that path before invoking the Hyphenator for the first time.
Register the autoloader by calling Org\Heigl\Hyphenator\Hyphenator::registerAutoload()
Hyphenate!
